accumulatetime.label: Elapsed race time
accumulatetime.eq: The race has been running for {{seconds}}
accumulatetime.gt: More than {{seconds}} have passed since the race started
accumulatetime.gte: At least {{seconds}} have passed since the race started
accumulatetime.lt: Less than {{seconds}} have passed since the race started
accumulatetime.lte: At most {{seconds}} have passed since the race started

activate_count_all.label: Activated skills (total)
activate_count_all.eq: You have activated exactly {{v}} skills since the race started
activate_count_all.gt: You have activated more than {{v}} skills since the race started
activate_count_all.gte: You have activated at least {{v}} skills since the race started
activate_count_all.lt: You have activated fewer than {{v}} skills since the race started
activate_count_all.lte: You have activated at most {{v}} skills since the race started

activate_count_end_after.label: Activated skills in late-race or later
activate_count_end_after.gte: You have activated at least {{v}} skills in the late-race or later

activate_count_heal.label: Activated recovery skills
activate_count_heal.gte: You have activated at least {{v}} recovery skills since the race started

activate_count_middle.label: Activated skills in mid-race
activate_count_middle.gte: You have activated at least {{v}} skills in the mid-race

activate_count_start.label: Activated skills in early-race
activate_count_start.gte: You have activated at least {{v}} skills in the early-race

all_corner_random.label: Random corner trigger
all_corner_random.eq_1: You're in a random point of any corner.

base_power.label: Power stat
base_power.gte: Your base power is at least {{v}}
base_power.lte: Your base power is at most {{v}}

base_speed.label: Speed stat
base_speed.gte: Your base speed is at least {{v}}
base_speed.lte: Your base speed is at most {{v}}

base_stamina.label: Stamina stat
base_stamina.gte: Your base stamina is at least {{v}}
base_stamina.lte: Your base stamina is at most {{v}}

base_guts.label: Guts stat
base_guts.gte: Your base guts is at least {{v}}
base_guts.lte: Your base guts is at most {{v}}

base_wiz.label: Wisdom stat
base_wiz.gte: Your base wit is at least {{v}}
base_wiz.lte: Your base wit is at most {{v}}

bashin_diff_behind.label: Gap to runner behind
bashin_diff_behind.eq: The runner behind you is exactly {{bashin}} away
bashin_diff_behind.gte: The runner behind you is further than {{bashin}} away
bashin_diff_behind.lte: The runner behind you is closer than {{bashin}} away

bashin_diff_infront.label: Gap to runner ahead
bashin_diff_infront.eq: The runner ahead of you is exactly {{bashin}} away
bashin_diff_infront.gte: The runner ahead of you is further than {{bashin}} away
bashin_diff_infront.lte: The runner ahead of you is closer than {{bashin}} away

behind_near_lane_time.label: Time with runner right behind
behind_near_lane_time.gte: A runner has been right behind you for at least {{seconds}}

behind_near_lane_time_set1.label: Time with runner behind (wide range)
behind_near_lane_time_set1.gte: A runner has been behind you for at least {{seconds}}

blocked_all_continuetime.label: Time blocked front and side
blocked_all_continuetime.gte: You were surrounded for at least {{seconds}}

blocked_front.label: Blocked in front
blocked_front.eq_1: You are currently blocked by a runner in front
blocked_front.eq_0: You are not currently blocked by a runner in front

blocked_front_continuetime.label: Time blocked in front
blocked_front_continuetime.gte: You were blocked by a runner in front for at least {{seconds}}

blocked_side_continuetime.label: Time blocked on side
blocked_side_continuetime.gte: You were blocked by a runner on either side for at least {{seconds}}

change_order_up_end_after.label: Overtakes after late-race starts
change_order_up_end_after.gte: You have overtaken another runner at least {{v}} times since the late-race started

change_order_up_finalcorner_after.label: Overtakes after final corner starts
change_order_up_finalcorner_after.gte: You have overtaken another runner at least {{v}} times since the final corner started

change_order_up_middle.label: Overtakes in mid-race
change_order_up_middle.gte: You have overtaken another runner at least {{v}} times in the mid-race

compete_fight_count.label: Dueling count
compete_fight_count.gt: You have participated in more than {{v}} duels.
compete_fight_count.gt_1: You have participated in more than one duel.
compete_fight_count.gte: You have participated in at least {{v}} duels.
compete_fight_count.gte_1: You have participated in at least one duel.
compete_fight_count.eq_0: You have not participated in any duels.

corner.label: Corner segment
corner.eq_0: You are not on a corner
corner.eq_1: You are on the first corner
corner.eq_2: You are on the second corner
corner.eq_3: You are on the third corner
corner.eq_4: You are on the fourth corner

corner_count.label: Total corners in course
corner_count.eq_1: The course has exactly one corner
corner_count.gte: The course has at least {{v}} corners
corner_count.lte: The course has at most {{v}} corners

corner_random.label: Random trigger on a specific corner
corner_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on the first corner
corner_random.eq_2: You're in a random point on the second corner
corner_random.eq_3: You're in a random point on the third corner
corner_random.eq_4: You're in a random point on the fourth corner

course_distance.label: Course distance
course_distance.gte: The course is at least {{meters}} long
course_distance.lte: The course is at most {{meters}} long

distance_diff_rate.label: Position relative to leader
distance_diff_rate.eq: You're positioned exactly {{percent}} between the leader and the last runner
distance_diff_rate.gte: You're positioned no less than {{percent}} between the leader and the last runner
distance_diff_rate.lte: You're positioned no further than {{percent}} between the leader and the last runner

distance_diff_top.label: Gap from leader
distance_diff_top.eq: The gap between you and the leader is {{meters}}
distance_diff_top.gte: The gap between you and the leader is at least {{meters}}
distance_diff_top.lte: The gap between you and the leader is at most {{meters}}

distance_diff_top_float.label: Gap from leader (decimal)
distance_diff_top_float.eq: The gap between you and the leader is {{floatMeters}}
distance_diff_top_float.gte: The gap between you and the leader is at least {{floatMeters}}
distance_diff_top_float.lte: The gap between you and the leader is at most {{floatMeters}}

distance_rate.label: Race progress
distance_rate.eq: You're just at the {{percent}} of the race
distance_rate.gt: You're passed the {{percent}} of the race
distance_rate.gte: You're passed the {{percent}} of the race
distance_rate.gte_50: You're at the second half of the race
distance_rate.gte_80: You're near the end of the race
distance_rate.lt: You're before the {{percent}} of the race
distance_rate.lte: You're before the {{percent}} of the race
distance_rate.lte_50: You're at the first half of the race

distance_rate_after_random.label: Random trigger after race progress
distance_rate_after_random.eq: You're in a random point after the race is {{percent}} of the way through
distance_rate_after_random.eq_50: You're in a random point after the second half of the race

distance_type.label: Race distance type
distance_type.eq_3: The race is a medium distance track
distance_type.eq_4: The race is a long distance track

down_slope_random.label: Random trigger on downhill
down_slope_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on a downhill

grade.label: Race grade
grade.eq_100: The race is a G1 race
grade.eq_200: The race is a G2 race
grade.eq_300: The race is a G3 race
grade.eq_400: The race is an Open race
grade.eq_700: The race is a Pre-Open race
grade.eq_800: The race is a Maiden race
grade.eq_900: The race is a Debut race
grade.eq_999: The race is a Daily race

ground_condition.label: Track condition
ground_condition.eq_1: The track is in firm conditions
ground_condition.eq_2: The track is in good conditions
ground_condition.eq_3: The track is in soft conditions
ground_condition.eq_4: The track is in heavy conditions

ground_type.label: Ground type
ground_type.eq_1: The race is on a Turf track
ground_type.eq_2: The race is on a Dirt track

hp_per.label: Remaining stamina
hp_per.gte: You have {{percent}} or more stamina left
hp_per.lte: You have {{percent}} or less stamina left
hp_per.lte_30: You have 30% or less stamina left
hp_per.lte_45: You have 45% or less stamina left
hp_per.lte_70: You have 70% or less stamina left

infront_near_lane_time.label: Time with runner right ahead
infront_near_lane_time.gte: A runner has been right ahead of you for at least {{seconds}}

is_activate_other_skill_detail.label: Another trigger of this skill already activated
is_activate_other_skill_detail.eq_1: Another trigger of this skill already activated

is_basis_distance.label: Core distance (divisible by 400m)
is_basis_distance.eq_1: The race is on Standard distance track
is_basis_distance.eq_0: The race is on Non-Standard distance track

is_badstart.label: Late start status
is_badstart.eq_0: You did not have a late start

is_behind_in.label: Runner behind is toward inner rail
is_behind_in.eq_1: The runner behind you is closer to the inner rail
is_behind_in.eq_0: The runner behind you is not closer to the inner rail

is_dirtgrade.label: Local dirt track race
is_dirtgrade.eq_1: The race is on a local dirt track
is_dirtgrade.eq_0: The race is not on a local dirt track

is_finalcorner.label: At or after final corner
is_finalcorner.eq_1: You're at or after the final corner

is_finalcorner_laterhalf.label: Later half of final corner
is_finalcorner_laterhalf.eq_1: You're in the later half of the final corner

is_finalcorner_random.label: Random trigger on final corner
is_finalcorner_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on the final corner

is_hp_empty_onetime.label: Stamina depleted at least once
is_hp_empty_onetime.eq_1: Your stamina has been depleted at least once in the race

is_lastspurt.label: In last spurt mode
is_lastspurt.eq_1: You're currently in last spurt mode

is_last_straight.label: On final straight
is_last_straight.eq_1: You're currently on the final straight

is_last_straight_onetime.label: Just entered final straight
is_last_straight_onetime.eq_1: You've just entered the final straight

last_straight_random.label: Random trigger on final straight
last_straight_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on the final straight

is_move_lane.label: Recent lane movement
is_move_lane.eq_1: You've moved toward the inner rail
is_move_lane.eq_2: You've moved away from the inner rail

is_overtake.label: Has overtake target
is_overtake.eq_1: You can overtake the runner in front of you
is_overtake.eq_0: You cannot overtake the runner in front of you

is_surrounded.label: Surrounded by runners
is_surrounded.eq_1: You are currently surrounded by runners
is_surrounded.eq_0: You are not currently surrounded by runners

lane_type.label: Current lane region
lane_type.eq_0: You're running on the inner lane
lane_type.eq_1: You're running on the middle lane
lane_type.eq_2: You're running on the outer lane
lane_type.eq_3: You're running on the outside lane

lastspurt.label: Last spurt stamina state
lastspurt.eq_0: You do not have enough stamina to finish at base speed
lastspurt.eq_1: You can finish at base speed but not at max speed
lastspurt.eq_2: You can finish at max speed

motivation.label: Race motivation
motivation.gte_3: Your motivation is Normal or better
motivation.gte_4: Your motivation is Good or better

near_count.label: Nearby runner count
near_count.gte: There are at least {{v}} runners nearby
near_count.lte: There are at most {{v}} runners nearby

order.label: Current race position
order.gte: You are behind {{ord}} place or worse
order.lte: You are in {{ord}} place or better

order_rate.label: Position percentile
order_rate.eq: You're at {{percent}} of the pack (CM: {{cm}}, LoH: {{loh}})
order_rate.gt: You're above {{percent}} of the pack (CM: {{cm}}, LoH: {{loh}})
order_rate.gte: You're at least at {{percent}} of the pack (CM: {{cm}}, LoH: {{loh}})
order_rate.lt: You're below {{percent}} of the pack (CM: {{cm}}, LoH: {{loh}})
order_rate.lte: You're at most at {{percent}} of the pack (CM: {{cm}}, LoH: {{loh}})
order_rate.lte_50: You are in the first half of the pack
order_rate.gte_50: You are in the second half of the pack

order_rate_in20_continue.label: Stayed within top 20%
order_rate_in20_continue.eq_1: You stayed within the top 20% for the race

order_rate_in40_continue.label: Stayed within top 40%
order_rate_in40_continue.eq_1: You stayed within the top 40% for the race

order_rate_in50_continue.label: Stayed within top 50%
order_rate_in50_continue.eq_1: You stayed within the top 50% for the race

order_rate_in80_continue.label: Stayed within top 80%
order_rate_in80_continue.eq_1: You stayed within the top 80% for the race

order_rate_out20_continue.label: Stayed outside top 20%
order_rate_out20_continue.eq_1: You stayed outside the top 20% for the race

order_rate_out40_continue.label: Stayed outside top 40%
order_rate_out40_continue.eq_1: You stayed outside the top 40% for the race

order_rate_out50_continue.label: Stayed outside top 50%
order_rate_out50_continue.eq_1: You stayed outside the top 50% for the race

order_rate_out70_continue.label: Stayed outside top 70%
order_rate_out70_continue.eq_1: You stayed outside the top 70% for the race

overtake_target_no_order_up_time.label: Time with overtake targets
overtake_target_no_order_up_time.gte: You have had overtake targets for at least {{seconds}}

overtake_target_time.label: Time as someone else's overtake target
overtake_target_time.gte: You have been an overtake target for at least {{seconds}}

phase.label: Race phase
phase.gte_2: During the late-race or the last spurt
phase.lte_1: During the early-race or the mid-race

phase_corner_random.label: Random trigger on corner in phase
phase_corner_random.eq_0: You're in a random point on a corner in the early-race
phase_corner_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on a corner in the mid-race
phase_corner_random.eq_2: You're in a random point on a corner in the late-race
phase_corner_random.eq_3: You're in a random point on a corner in the last spurt phase

phase_firsthalf.label: First half of phase
phase_firsthalf.eq_0: You're in the first half of the early-race
phase_firsthalf.eq_1: You're in the first half of the mid-race
phase_firsthalf.eq_2: You're in the first half of the late-race
phase_firsthalf.eq_3: You're in the first half of the last spurt phase

phase_firsthalf_random.eq_0: You're in a random point in the first half of the early-race

phase_firsthalf_random.eq_2: You're in a random point in the first half of the late-race
phase_firsthalf_random.eq_3: You're in a random point in the first half of the last spurt phase

phase_firstquarter.label: First quarter of phase
phase_firstquarter.eq_0: You're in the first quarter of the early-race
phase_firstquarter.eq_1: You're in the first quarter of the mid-race
phase_firstquarter.eq_2: You're in the first quarter of the late-race
phase_firstquarter.eq_3: You're in the first quarter of the last spurt phase

phase_firstquarter_random.eq_0: You're in a random point in the first quarter of early-race
phase_firstquarter_random.eq_1: You're in a random point in the first quarter of mid-race
phase_firstquarter_random.eq_2: You're in a random point in the first quarter of late-race
phase_firstquarter_random.eq_3: You're in a random point in the first quarter of last spurt phase

phase_laterhalf_random.label: Random trigger in later half of phase
phase_laterhalf_random.eq_0: You're in a random point in the later half of early-race
phase_laterhalf_random.eq_1: You're in a random point in the later half of mid-race
phase_laterhalf_random.eq_2: You're in a random point in the later half of late-race
phase_laterhalf_random.eq_3: You're in a random point in the later half of last spurt phase

phase_random.label: Random trigger in phase
phase_random.eq_0: You're in a random point in the early-race
phase_random.eq_1: You're in a random point in the mid-race
phase_random.eq_2: You're in a random point in the late-race
phase_random.eq_3: You're in a random point in the last spurt phase

phase_straight_random.label: Random trigger on straight in phase
phase_straight_random.eq_0: You're in a random point on a straight in the early-race
phase_straight_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on a straight in the mid-race
phase_straight_random.eq_2: You're in a random point on a straight in the late-race
phase_straight_random.eq_3: You're in a random point on a straight in the last spurt phase

popularity.label: Popularity rank
popularity.gte: You're ranked at least {{ord}} in popularity
popularity.lte: You're ranked at most {{ord}} in popularity

post_number.label: Gate block
post_number.gte: Your gate block is {{v}} or higher
post_number.lte: Your gate block is {{v}} or lower

remain_distance.label: Remaining distance
remain_distance.gt: You have more than {{v}} meters left
remain_distance.gte: You have at least {{v}} meters left
remain_distance.lt: You have less than {{v}} meters left
remain_distance.lte: You have at most {{v}} meters left

running_style_count_same.label: Amount of runners sharing your running style
running_style_count_same.eq: Exactly {{v}} runners share your running style
running_style_count_same.gte: At least {{v}} runners share your running style
running_style_count_same.lte: At most {{v}} runners share your running style
running_style_count_same.lte_1: Nobody shares the same running style with you

running_style_count_same_rate.label: Percent sharing your running style
running_style_count_same_rate.eq: Exactly {{percent}} of runners share your running style
running_style_count_same_rate.gte: At least the {{percent}} of runners share your running style
running_style_count_same_rate.lte: At most the {{percent}} of runners share your running style

running_style_count_nige_otherself.eq: There are exactly {{v}} other Front Runners in the race
running_style_count_nige_otherself.gte: There are at least {{v}} other Front Runners in the race
running_style_count_nige_otherself.lte: There are at most {{v}} other Front Runners in the race

running_style_equal_popularity_one.label: Shares style with most popular runner

running_style_temptation_count_nige.label: Rushing Front Runners count
running_style_temptation_count_nige.gte: At least {{v}} Front Runners are rushing
running_style_temptation_count_nige.lte: At most {{v}} Front Runners are rushing

running_style_temptation_count_senko.label: Rushing Pace Chasers count
running_style_temptation_count_senko.gte: At least {{v}} Pace Chasers are rushing
running_style_temptation_count_senko.lte: At most {{v}} Pace Chasers are rushing

running_style_temptation_count_sashi.label: Rushing Late Surgers count

running_style_temptation_count_sashi.lte: At most {{v}} Late Surgers are rushing

running_style_temptation_count_oikomi.label: Rushing End Closers count

running_style_temptation_count_oikomi.lte: At most {{v}} End Closers are rushing

same_skill_horse_count.gte: At least {{v}} runners have this skill (including you)
same_skill_horse_count.lte: At most {{v}} runners have this skill (including you)

season.label: Season
season.eq_5: It's in late spring (the cherry blossom season)

straight_random.label: Random trigger on straight
straight_random.eq_1: You're in a random point on a straight

temptation_count_behind.label: Rushing runners behind count

temptation_count_infront.lte: At most {{v}} runners are rushing ahead of you

up_slope_random.label: Random trigger on uphill

visiblehorse.label: Visible runner count

remain_distance_viewer_id.label: Any player runner remaining distance
